Interest ex coupon" are properly populated on Lots when: 'Accrued interest dissolution principle' is 'Immediate' 'Accrued interest per tax lot' is enabled "Calculate EOP accrued interest on settled position" is On Default booking date is agreement with a flow that includes partial/full reallocation and unsettled incrementing and decrementing transactions.

Business description:
From 24.10, new Parties tab under Extra Information for both Portfolio Groups and Portfolios. In addition, for Portfolio Groups, the previously existing sub window “Extra Information” is transformed into a tab Info under a new sub window “Extra Information”. The field Resident was moved from Info tab to the new Parties tab. With these changes, the end users will lose access to the form that they had access to before until the sysadmin has granted them access. Thus, a conversion program is necessary to update the relevant entries in Authorisation Command table.

Technical description:
 
Updating authorization for Portfolio Groups 

The conversion will function by finding all user authorization profiles (pAUTPROFIK) in Authorisation Command table (tAUTCOMMANDS) where there is access to Extra Information form by checking whether there is a record with form name (pFMNAME) fmPORTGROUPS and pointer (pPTR) cmdPORTGROUPEXTRA with Read (pAUTRED) value set to be true. For these profiles, add new records to tAUTCOMMANDS with content as follows: 

- Form name: fmPORTGROUPEXTRAMAIN  
- Pointer: cmdPORTGROUPEXTRAPARTIES and cmdPORTGROUPEXTRAINFO for Parties tab and Info tab, respectively. 
- Read: true  

Updating authorization for Portfolios 

Similar procedure for Portfolios. First, find all authorization profiles in Authorisation Command table for Extra Information form by checking form name fmPORTFOLIOSEXTRAMAIN and pointer cmdPORTFOLIOSEXTRA1 and Read value set to be true. For these profiles, add new records to tAUTCOMMANDS with content as follows: 

- Form name: fmPORTFOLIOSEXTRAMAIN
- Pointer: cmdPORTFOLIOSEXTRAPARTIES
- Read: true 

Consequences of the conversion:
- All authorization profiles which had access in Portfolio Groups window to Extra Information sub-window, now will have access to Info and Parties tabs under Extra Information sub-window. 
- All authorization profiles which had access in Portfolios window to "Residence" field (under Info tab in Extra Information sub-window), now will have access to to Parties tab under Extra Information sub-window. 
- All authorization profiles which did not have access to above mentioned, still will not have access to new tabs.

Backdated transactions created between the last business day and up to and including the calculation date are now included in the determination of whether or not a breach is considered active or passive. These backdated transactions will henceforth also be used to determine whether or not a rule should fail, if the property 'Only fail on active trades' is selected.

after this change when using  pricing and key ratios queue handler worker service(s) when the error happens on Pricing and key ratio queue handler worker service during saving or during calculation(partly coverage) then system retry 3 more times and if that didn't help then park 'bad' message to  exception queue so user can investigate. Technical 3T

In case EOP or Coupon System Owned Transactions, that are in the middle of a flow that includes unsettled incrementing or decrementing transactions, are reversed, “Calc Accrued Interest” and “Interest, dividend, capital event" amounts are properly populated on taxlots, when 'Accrued interest dissolution principle' is 'Immediate', 'Accrued interest per tax lot' is Yes, “Calculate EOP accrued interest on settled position" is On or Off, Default booking date is Agreement. View Holding Match is updated correctly in Parent and Period Closure framework.

When running a specific internal automated test it could happen from time to time that the database would be busy when trying to lock a table in relation to General ledger holding key look up/creation. This caused the test to be flaky. The logic surrounding this has been improved for unit test execution by retrying to lock the table several times before eventually giving up with an database busy error message if the table still couldn't be locked.
To ease debugging the automatic collection of database statistics will now write information to the service log.
There is possible to import Fx Roll Defaults Definition entities in XMGR

Dead Security Lendings positions are no longer being grouped with their underlying during Portfolio Calculation. This should improve performance in situation with "Include zero positions" set to "Always" and a lot of dead security lending positions.

The parameter 'Service Options / STP / Disable enforced check of portfolio group/portfolio being processed' has been changed to a drop down with three options 'Disabled', 'Status services' and 'All services'. The default is 'Status services' where the system "only" check if another status service is currently processing the portfolio group/portfolio. If selecting 'All' it's all services, including match and communication server.

1) If both transaction code sets are identical, with one or more passive transaction selected, then the active passive code set should return a non-empty list.
2) Transactions should always be loaded for a portfolio if ActivePassiveDetermination using Transaction code sets is enabled in Branch Configuration.
3) Active trades should also be detected on rules without grouping ( affects both ActivePassiveDetermination using Transaction code sets and OnlyFailOnActiveTrade logic. )
4) If ActivePassiveDetermination using Transaction code sets is enabled, always update active/passive determination on each validation, so long as the alert's current active / passive status is not Active.
GetConstraints API will validate and return  an error message if the portfolio under a portfolio group doesn't exist.
When trading bonds quoted on margin an actual trading margin was calculated which slightly differed from the entered quote. The error has been corrected.
The 'Transaction Option' in tab 'Fields' - 'Fields in additional data' now works for transactions created and/or modified in 'General Exchange' window.

Fixed an error in compliance pre-trade regarding various data exceptions for released preliminary transactions. Introducing the ability to create a SCD user from C# on the basis of the authorized principal name and the Claims from an Oauth2 JWT bearer token.

This will only be relevant in case it is impossible to lookup the user in the scd installation by the principal name.

If a the user is marked inactive, the authorisation will fail and we will not create a user.

To successfully create a Scd User in the login flow it requires that in the AAD of an azure subscription,

The user must have defined some auth roles where the role names start with a prefix, e.g. "Prod" followed by the name of a normal user role expected to be defined in the Scd installation.
In the scd installation apart from the roles must exist, the below parameters must be set, e.g.:

UserLogonLDAP_Installed=1 (ins.ini)
LdapPrefix=Prod (cnf.ini)
useosaut=dAUTHTYPE int value (cnf.ini)

Even if the ‘Always return error level if job fails’ was checked, the batch job group returned ‘Executed’ instead of ‘Failed’ if one or more batch jobs within the batch job group failed. This has been corrected.
For batch task 'Specific Function - Batch Execution' the possibility of using 'Target line' has been removed, as it was a security risk.

The Validate Market Data Using Service Platform window's initialization functionality attempt to acquire exclusive database lock on the Market Data Validation Queue (MKTDATAVALQUEUE) table.
Previously it did so with a no wait statement and then waited for 6 seconds before trying again. Now it will attempt to acquire the exclusive lock for 6 seconds, and then wait for another 6 seconds before trying again.
This should make it more likely to acquire the exclusive database lock.

When importing external forecasts via 'Import\Retrieve External Forecast'  it will now be possible to activate the single log viewer by pressing the Log button next to the 'Import' button in the external 'Alternative Investments Manager' ribbon section.

Improve handling of situation where refresh token isn't available.
Ban calls to an obsolete family of functions
Messages send from the Configuration Service could include <tabs>, <line feed> and <new line>, these have been removed (replaced with spaces).
Update SimulationMacro with applying ValueBased simulation setting (from settings template).

Solve some issues for FAM settings “Accrued Interest per Tax Lot”=”Yes”, “Accrued interest dissolution principle”=“Immediate” or “Incremental PC” for coupon transactions in unsettled period for sells in ex coupon period.

CustomerApplyNote: This is reversal of changes made on D-68649 which unintentionally disabled validation of variable yield adjustments when the P/L method is average-like.

ChangeNote: Fixed Order Outbox update when program trade is not in segment, but its underlying dealer order is.
Assemblies loaded explicitly in APL OO constructor.
Technical/3T: The way the job is executed has been changed so the update will be done. The "job progress screen" will however not show.
New table tHOLDUNSETFACCONTRMATCH has been created to track contract nominals for unsettled trades
Internal change: clients should not be affected.
Do not allow any code analysis errors for OTC core code
Fixed a crash when importing domain values using DFS with "Create order fills before importing main dealer transactions" reformat function.
Configuration Service now support 'PRICEQUALITIES'.
IMS tracing have been added to all configuration services calls in the APL code, meaning it's now possible to trace what methods and their parameters are called.

It is now possible to 'Filter' the list of users. It's possible to filter using: User, User name, Net ID and Machine ID. Furthermore the form has been changed to a normal form, meaning it can stay open when other forms are used. And finally the form now got a automatic update, meaning the list of users are refreshed automatically.

When saving a Securities Lending Maturity' 'MatReverse' transaction having 'Actual Settlement' data wrongly the error message 'Underlying holdings cannot be found. Try modifying the transaction instead.'  could appear. This has been fixed.
When the transactions for Bonds are created in Dealer Window the value in Yield is calculated differently after the user removes it. This was corrected.

Actual Settlement data update now suported correct for security lending transactions and its booking. This all making it possible to use NOMINALACT framework to ensure collateral return in sync with actual return of security lended before and covered with the collateral.
There was a crash while fetching position in Coupons screen for bonds with Interest type Multiple. That is fixed now
Not relevant for release
Fixes an error for Total Return Swaps, when calculating Accrued interest EOP key ratios on a date that lies between a business day adjusted coupon term date and the corresponding coupon payment date.
Time Series of Issue Yield will now be calculated for an instrument having a Default date specified on the Interest/Redemptions Conventions sub-screen, as if no Default date was specified.
Technical change improving code maintainability with no impact on functionality
Added handling of default for Auxiliary Market Data Max age for Inflation curves
Avoid crash when using Auxiliary market data
It was possible to select Show Values from context menu even though the field would never be open for input.

It was not possible to select a Portfolio from the F4 popup list, as the field was not updated with the selected portfolio. This issue was partly fixed on  D-73554, and now finally fixed on this defect.
There is the technical change that does not effect any customer installations. The flaky UT was fixed.
3T/Technical: Refresh action enabled for applications of type presentation

Made TRAX notional amount optional
Added TRAX notional set for index certificates
Session State Machine first cut
Replay tool replay fills only OrderManager
Server side validations required for ChangeDealingDesk command
Refactor CDS Place request factories
High-performance logging
Upgrade NATS server to version 2.10.14
Compliance Setting Live

Selecting a transaction row in the grid in 'Unsettled Loan Facility Trades' and choosing 'Settle Loan Facilities' effects that we generate pre-transaction data by copying the existing transaction's data from the grid to the latter window. The actual transaction status must not be copied.
Avoid crashes when entering blank term dates in TRS sub-fixings
Remove static code analysis errors
Enable static code analysis gates
Remove  calls to obsolete functions
Mapping between simulation and transaction fields was fixed.

Selecting the "Paydown and forecast transactions" and/or  "Loan and forecasted transactions" check boxes no longer excluded forecasted transactions in the Cash Viewer applet of the Asset Manager. This has now been corrected. The checkboxes are available in the "Exclude Payment Types" section in the "Cash Viewer" tab of the "Settings Template" specified in the Properties of the Asset Manager.

In Order API for FX instruments we cannot use quotation currency we have to use base currency and price currency depending on amount type.
PR and RC values are now shown in version 2 of the api. DollarDuration PC and RC figure should be blank and not zero
